about_the_game: Running for your life in sheer terror has never looked so good! This DLC pack gives the Laundry Day outfit to the Rush Week Victims. Note - if you played Rush Week before October 22nd 2024, you already own this outfit.

content_descriptors.notes: This game regularly depicts violence and gore.

detailed_description: Running for your life in sheer terror has never looked so good! This DLC pack gives the Laundry Day outfit to the Rush Week Victims. Note - if you played Rush Week before October 22nd 2024, you already own this outfit.
